detail_desc: Blouse in an airy modal weave with a V-neck with decorative gathers, concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the top and 3/4-length raglan sleeves with smocked cuffs.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and one back pocket. Brushed inside.
Handbag accessory in the shape of a tied scarf in a patterned weave with a sewn-in metal keyring and carabiner hook. Length approx. 34 cm.
Fully-fashioned trainers with mesh insoles and chunky, patterned soles.
All-in-one suit in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Skinny-fit trousers in washed, patterned, stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist. Zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Ankle-length trousers in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, a coin pocket at the front, back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Block-coloured swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Gently fitted jacket in woven fabric with welt pockets and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front. Sleeves with gathered seams. Lined.
Long T-shirt in soft, printed jersey with a wide neckline and dropped shoulders. Slightly longer at the back.
Tops in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a press-stud on one shoulder and kangaroo pocket. Long raglan sleeves with a ribbed panel, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Two elastic shoulder straps that cross at the back and elastic at the hem. Medium support.
Wrapover jersey top with a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Jacket in soft pile with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket, zipped side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Top in soft, textured sweatshirt fabric with long puff sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Suit trousers in an airy linen and cotton weave with elastication at the back of the waist and a zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Hairbands in a cotton blend with a bow at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Shorts in stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8x-12xY) zip fly, front and back pockets and raw-edge hems.
Collarless jacket in supersoft faux fur with a zip down the front and pockets in the side seams. Satin lining.

Backpack in water-repellent nylon with a handle at the top, adjustable shoulder straps and a roll-top opening with a tab and carabiner hook. One zipped outer compartment. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Depth 12 cm. Width 30 cm. Total height 63 cm.
Round-necked jumper in soft, rib-knit cashmere with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless jersey blouse with a small stand-up collar, opening with a long tie at the top and decorative gathers at the front and neck.
Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved romper suit in striped, slub cotton jersey with a chest pocket, button placket, opening with press-studs at the crotch and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves and hems.

Long dress in a soft, patterned Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a grandad collar and buttons down the front. Inset panels at the top that taper to the waist. Long dolman sleeves with gathers and a voluminous puff at the shoulders. Seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and a super-flared, softly draping skirt. Unlined.

prod_name: AK Sonoma roll neck rib jersey
detail_desc: Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a polo neck and long sleeves. Overlocked edges around the neck, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.
Hooded top and joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric. Top with an unlined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey.
Imitation suede sandals with a strap with a decorative bow at the front and an adjustable, elasticated ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Thin metal hoop earrings decorated with plastic beads. Length 4 cm.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Wide top in soft, printed jersey with short, wide dolman sleeves and a rounded hem.
Blouse in airy chiffon with 3/4-length sleeves and two flounces at the cuffs. Lined.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit with a regular waist, zip fly with a button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Loafers in soft leather with a moccasin seam at the front. Leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Long skirt in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and a coin pocket. High slits front and back and a contrasting colour selvedge at the hem.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Bead-embroidered rope bracelet made partly from recycled metal decorated with thin metal chains and beads made partly from recycled glass. Toggle clasp with a safety chain.
Fitted jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a stand-up collar, long sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.

Set with three long-sleeved bodysuits and three pairs of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Wrapover bodysuits with press-studs at the sides and crotch. Leggings with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Long, 5-pocket denim shorts with a regular waist, zip fly and button, slightly lower crotch and slim legs.
Slippers in soft fabric with faux fur linings and insoles, and soles with anti-slip protectors.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric. Double-layered hood with a decorative drawstring and wrapover front, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short T-shirt dress in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a unique nursing feature. Round neckline with a narrow trim, short sleeves and a drawstring at the waist. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access. Unlined.
Body in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in cotton twill with a high paper bag waist, zip fly and button and detachable tie belt. Patch front pockets and tapered legs.
Fully lined swimsuit with a lightly draped front and gathers in the sides. Integral bra with removable inserts and space for breast prostheses, and an elasticated hem. Adjustable shoulder straps.
Nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with soft lace trims. Non-wired padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Chest pocket with a button, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short-sleeved top in lightweight jersey with a V-neck.
Long-sleeved bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a heart-shaped button at the neckline.
Small, elasticated scrunchies in a patterned weave with a tie detail. Circumference approx. 9 cm.
Short parka in washed cotton twill with a stand-up collar and drawstring hood. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, side pockets with a press-stud, and a press-stud at the cuffs. Lined.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and covered elastication at the hem. No fasteners.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif, wrapover jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Imitation leather card holder with four card slots, a flap and concealed press-stud.
Jacket in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, concealed zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short, airy lace dress with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the front with ties at the top. Short puff sleeves with covered elastication at the hems and gathered seams at the waist and hem for added width. V-neck underdress with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Jacquard-patterned sports vest top in fast-drying jersey.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.

Padded, knee-length jacket in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Hood with an elasticated drawstring, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, concealed side pockets with a zip, and long raglan sleeves. The filling is made from recycled polyester.
V-neck jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacket in soft, fluffy faux fur with notch lapels, a concealed press-stud fastening at the front and patch front pockets. Lined.
Knitted dress for a dog with pompoms on the back and ribbed flounces at the hem. Ribbed collar and ribbing around the front legs.
Pattern-knit trainer socks in a cotton blend.
Printed jersey top with short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long, V-neck dress in a crêpe weave with a smocked seam below the bust, short butterfly sleeves and slits in the sides. Half-lined.

All-in-one suit in printed, organic cotton jersey with a jersey-lined hood and long sleeves. Concealed zip in the side, press-studs at the top, a kangaroo pocket at the front and foldover ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Long-sleeved tops in ribbed, organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a scalloped trim around the neckline.
